text: Ani jara amhi kahi mudatiparyanta tyancyavarila siksa- yatana sthagita keli tara he niscita udâ€Œgaratila ki azabala konatya gostine rokhale ahe, aika! Jya divasi azaba tyancya javala ye'una pohocela, maga to tyancyavaruna talanara nahi, maga tara jyaci te thatta udavita hote, toca tyancyavara ulatuna padela
